Installation of TEAM Mentor 4.0 consists of three major steps.
1. [Installation of TEAM Mentor 3.6 Back-end ](article/fa3888bd-c6d0-4f51-a4d1-0470794140b2) 2. Installation of TEAM Mentor 4.0 Front-end 3. Installation and configuration of IIS Reverse Proxy
First start by unzipping the installation file.
You should have the following directory structure:
![](/Image/install01.png)
Install all the components in the Dependencies folder. Install using all defaults.
Continue by following Installation of [TEAM Mentor 3.6 instructions.](article/fa3888bd-c6d0-4f51-a4d1-0470794140b2)
